Language.name: English
Language.String: A Grunt Lance equipped with a Fuel Rod Cannon that excels against vehicles.
Marines wielding Battle Rifles to combat enemy infantry at range. Can be upgraded to add a Sniper Marine to the squad.
Gauss Warthogs are special Warthog variants equipped with a very powerful Gauss Cannon. These Warthogs are capable of dishing out lots of damage against Air and Ground vehicles.
Pair of Elites that shred infantry at close range.
Sword-wielding Elite General that drops from orbit.
An inspiration to all grunts, deacons are the highest ranking grunts in the Covenant.
Shade Turrets are stationary turrets that can be placed anywhere on the battlefield to defend a location.
Improved armor allows Heavy Grunts to sustain more damage.
Heavy Grunts gain the ability to throw incendiary grenades, which explode on impact and burn the affected area.
Heavy Grunt Lance gain a shield that absorbs some incoming damage.
Light infantry units that shred infantry using at close range.
Needler Grunt Lances gain one additional Grunt.
Needles will occasionally cause a large explosion that will deal area damage.
Needlers are upgraded to output more damage.
Needler Elites gain shields that absorb incoming damage.
Needles will occasionally cause a large explosion that will deal area damage.
Upgrade Needler Elites to dual-wield Needlers, increasing their damage output.
Cicadas are well-rounded light vehicles that provide decent damage at a long range.
Cicadas gain a shield that absorbs incoming damage.
Upgrades Elites to dual-wield Plasma Rifles.
Upgrades Elites to Elite Rangers, which use Jetpacks to fly above the battlefield.
Elite that wields a Plasma Rifle.
Marine Squad equipped with a Rocket launcher that excels against vehicles.
Rockets can track enemy aircraft, making them much more effective against them.
Grunts gain the ablity to throw Plasma Grenades.
2 Grunts are added to the squad.
Grunts gain rechargable energy shields that absorb incoming damage, increasing the survivabilty of the squad.
UNSC Marine Squad equipped with Battle Rifles. These Marines deal slighlty more damage than Assault Rifle Marines and have a slighlty farther attack range.
Produces Resources faster than a Warehouse.
A Jackal Sniper accompanied by two Needler Jackals.
Large Elite-led infantry squad consisting of both Jackals and Grunts.
Rocket Warthogs are special Warthog variants that are equipped with Rocket Turrets, which specialize against air units, but can hold their own against most lightly-armored unit types.
Flame Warthogs are special Warthog variants that are outfitted with medium-range Flamethrowers that specialize against Infantry and Flood.
Marines equipped with Shotguns that can deal very heavy damage at the cost of range.
Shotgun Marines gain an ability to quickly fire their Shotguns at enemy units.
A third Marine is added to each Shotgun Marine unit.
Increases the range of Marine Marksmen.
Adds a Sniper to each Marine Marksman unit.
Adds another Marksman to each Marine Marksman unit.
Grunt Deacons' Needlers cause Supercombine explosion on enemy infantry units.
Grunt Deacons can garrison Spirits and Towers.
Grunt Deacons' trade in their Needlers for Fuel Rod Cannons.
Grunt Deacons gain the ability to build Covenant Shade Turrets.
Grunt Deacons gain the ability to build Covenant Sniper Towers.
Grunt Deacons gain the ability to build a Covenant Mega Turret.
A small mine that explodes after enemies get too close or after being attacked.
Jackal infantry that make use of Plasma Pistol Overcharges and Defense Gauntlets to form a very versatile unit.
Highly skilled infantry that specialize at killing infantry at a distance using a Needle Rifle, and later a Focus Rifle.

Spartans each gain different armor abilities that enhance their combat capabilites: Air Assault - Jetpack Grenadier - Sprint Guard - Armor Lock Operator - Active Camo Sniper - Hologram Medic - Regenerator
Spartans gain increased speed and enhanced reflexes that allow them to dodge incoming projectiles.
Each Spartan gains different weapon upgrades that enhance their combat effectiveness.
The Plasma Rhino is an artillery Unit that can lockdown to fire at a much greater distance.
Rhinos now fire a superheated plasma blast that leaves the surrounding terrain on fire.
An additional set of composite alloy plates boost the Rhinos damage mediation.
Adds a Grenadier in the passenger seat.
Upgrades Machine Gun turret to a Gauss Cannon.
Gains the ability to fire an Anvil Round that deals heavy damage and stuns enemy units.
Anders gains the active ability to repair a vehicle or building at a drastically increased rate.
Anders' attacks now deal area damage.
Support leader that can repair friendly vehicles and buildings.
Unlocks the ability to hotdrop ODST units anywhere on the battlefield. This is only available to Captain Cutter.
Adds another ODST to each squad.
Adds a Heavy ODST wielding a Rocket Launcher to each ODST squad.
Adds an ODST Commander to each squad, improving the combat efficiency of each squad.
Marine Combat Medic that heals nearby friendly infantry units and can deploy a stationary Regenerator that heals nearby units.
Brute Heavies deal heavy damage to vehicles using their Fuel Rod Cannons, but have low hitpoints.
Brute Heavies occasionally throw incendiary grenades at infantry, which explode on impact and burn the affected area.
Brute Heavies are promoted to Heavy Jump Pack Brutes, allowing them to cross impassable terrain
Heavy Anti-Air vehicle equipped with Fuel Rod Cannons.
Adds an energy shield that deflects some incoming damage.
Anti-Air Wraiths gain the active volley ability.
Anti-Air Wraiths are upgraded to track enemy air units.
Elite Ultras are equipped with heavy weapons that shred vehicles.
Elite Ultras gain the ability to throw incendiary grenades, which allow them to be a bit more versatile.
Elite Ultras trade their Fuel Rod Cannons for Plasma Launchers, which are able to track enemy units for better accuracy.
Flame Warthogs gain the ability to ram enemy units.
Adds a Marine armed with an Incendiary Grenade Launcher to improve attack strength.
An advanced, higher burn point fuel increases damage to all organic units.
Rocket Warthogs gain the ability to ram enemy units.
Adds a Marine armed with a Grenade Launcher to improve attack strength.
Gauss Warthogs gain the ability to ram enemy units.
Adds a Marine armed with a Grenade Launcher to improve attack strength.
Improves the Gauss Warthogs cannon to fire more powerful blasts.
Elites and Grunts can throw Plasma Grenades and Jackals can fire overcharged plasma blasts to stun enemy vehicles.
Another Jackal is added to the squad to increase combat capability. Jackals gain defensive shields to deflect incoming damage.
Two more Grunts are added to the squad to increase damage output. Jackal shields are improved so they wont collapse from taking damage.
All Jackals in the squad recieve a defensive shield to deflect incoming damage.
Jackal Snipers replace their Carbines with Beam Rifles to kill enemy infantry at a greater range, and Needler Jackals needles occasionally cause large explosions that deal area damage.
Jackal shields are upgraded so they wont collapse when taking damage.
Transfer to the "Spartans" page. Prototype UNSC super soldiers, the Spartans possess extreme combat skills. They can be upgraded to gain additional armor abilities.
The leader of Red team, Jerome uses a Spartan Laser to destroy enemy units at range.
Jerome gains the ability to hijack enemy vehicles or commandeer friendly vehicles.
Jerome gains increased speed and enhanced reflexes that allow them to dodge incoming projectiles.
Jerome gains a Spartan Laser, drastically improving his damage output.
Watchtowers have one function, to provide the base with a large line of sight. They can be upgraded to turrets.
Upgrades the turret to a watchtower, providing the base with a much larger line of sight.
Jackals gain the ability to overcharge their plasma pistols to deal more damage.
Jackals gain deflective shields that absorb incoming damage.
The Brute Minors leading Jackals Squads are upgraded to Brute Captains. They are equipped with Brute Shots and more powerful armor that can deflect small arms projectiles.
Drops an Elite General anywhere on the battlefield.
Skirmisher Champions agility allow them to constantly dodge projectiles.
Skirmisher Champions are now equipped with Focus Rifles.
Skirmisher Champions gain shields that absorb incoming damage.
Pelicans are capable of transporting both infantry and vehicles across the battlefield.
Spirits are capable of transporting both infantry and vehicles across the battlefield.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
A Grunt carrying a large bomb that will explode when near enemy units.
Bomb Grunts gain the ability to sprint towards enemy units.
When detonated, bombs will leave behind a burning chemical on enemies.
Place a land mine that will explode when in close proximity to enemy units. Caution: Friendly units won't detonate the mine, but will be damaged by its explosion.
Upgrade this land mine to inflict fire damage on enemy infantry units when detonated.
Upgrade this land mine to stun enemy vehicles when detonated.
Upgrade this land mine to inflict corrosive damage on enemy vehicles when detonated.
Spirits are used by the Covenant to transport infantry and vehicles to any location on the map.
Spirits gain a substantial speed increase.
Increases the carrying capacity of Spirits from 6 population to 9 population.
A large, cheap squad of Grunts that will provide great returns per cost in combat.
Grunt Hordes gain a Grunt Ultra. Ultras are significantly better than Grunt Minors, and inspire them. This will improve the Grunt Lance's overall combat effectiveness.
Pelicans gain a substantial speed increase.
Increases the carrying capacity of Pelicans from 9 population to 12 population.
Wielding SMGs and ARs, Air Assault Spartans are well rounded units that, when upgraded, use the air to their advantage via their Jetpacks.
Heavy Spartans that specialize in defending a position. Once upgraded, their Armor Lock ability allows them to lockdown, severly reducing the amount of damage they take at the cost of mobility.
Spartan Medics specialize against heavily armored opponents. They also, when upgraded, have the ability to deploy Regenerators that heal nearby allies.
Spartan Medics specialize against heavily armored opponents. They also, when upgraded, have the ability to deploy Regenerators that heal nearby allies.
Operators specialize in close quarters combat. When upgraded, they gain permanent Active Camo that helps them get in close to their target before being seen.
Grenadier Spartans use their Grenade Launchers to great effect against less armored targets, and gain the abiity to Sprint very quickly across the battlefield when upgraded.
Snipers keep their distance from enemy units, and can use their Hologram ability to distract those that get in too close.
Lightly armored infantry that use Plasma Pistols against enemy units from above the battlefield.
Lightly armored infantry that use Needlers against enemy units from above the battlefield.
Lightly armored infantry that use Plasma Rifles against enemy units from above the battlefield.
Transfer to the Second page of the Summit.
Transfer to the First page of the Summit.
Adds another Drone to the unit.
Adds another Drone to the unit.
Adds another Needler Drone to the unit.
Adds another Needler Drone to the unit.
Adds another Plasma Rifle Drone to the unit.
Adds another Plasma Rifle Drone to the unit.
Brutes carrying Brute Shots that have the ability to cross impassable terrain using jump packs.
A group of Skirmisher Minors wielding Plasma Pistols.
A group of Skirmisher Minors wielding Needlers.
Transfer to the second page of the Hall.
Transfer to the first page of the Hall.
Skirmishers can overcharge their Plasma Pistols to fire an EMP blast.
Skirmishers agility allow them to constantly dodge projectiles.
Skirmisher Hitpoints and damage are increased.
Needles will occasionally cause a large explosion, dealing area damage.
Needler Skirmishers agility allow them to constantly dodge projectiles.
Needler Skirmisher Hitpoints and damage are increased.
Gain access to Forerunner buildings and structures.
Banshees gain the ability to dodge incoming projectiles.
Brutes carrying Fuel Rod Cannons that have the ability to cross impassable terrain using jump packs.
Upgrade this Mega Turret to garrison 1 squad of infantry. Also increases hitpoints.
Gives Forge his warthog, allowing him to travel around the map more quickly.
Modified Scorpions that are slow, durable, and use flame-based secondary weapons.
Equips Scorpions with a secondary Canister Shell attack. This attack is devastating to any infantry in its blast area.
Heavy Scorpions' Flamethrower is upgraded to a Flame Mortar, which has greater range and can attack air.
Sun Devils are Heavy Tanks equipped with a quickly-firing turret to decimate enemy air units.
A Grunt-designed Light Tank that makes up for its lack of heavy weaponry with its incredibly high rate of fire.
Adds an energy shield that deflects some incoming damage.
Upgrades Grunt Tank's main turret to fire at a greatly increased rate.
Grunt Tanks' Plasma Turrets are upgraded to fire tracking projectiles.
An ODST carrying a shotgun... duh.
An ODST carrying like a Rocket Launcher and stuff.
Increases the rotation speed for Sun Devil turrets, making them considerably more responsive in combat.
Sun Devils' turrets are upgraded to deal more damage.
Marine Grenadiers are good against ground and air vehicles, and can be upgraded to fire stun grenades.
Marine Grenadiers gain the ability to fire stun grenades at enemy units.
Marine Grenadiers' grenades have a great area of effect.
Ghost plasma cannons are upgraded to fire twice as fast.
Well-rounded Brute infantry armed with quickly firing Brute Plasma Rifles.
Well-rounded Brute infantry armed with quickly firing Brute Plasma Rifles, as well as Jump Packs that allow the crossing of impassible terrain.
Brute Minors are promoted to Jump Pack Brutes, allowing them to cross impassable terrain.
Jump Pack Brutes are now equipped with Brute Shots and will occasionally fire Electric Shots, which stun vehicles for a short duration.
Brute infantry wielding a Brute Shot and protected by deflective power armor. The armor only deflects small arms fire, and will temporarily break after sustaining too much damage.
Spectres are light vehicles that are capable of dealing decent damage at range with their plasma turrets, or ram enemies that get too close.
Drops ODST Snipers at target location.
Elite infantry that excel at killing enemies from a distance.
Brute Captains gain the ability to throw Plasma Grenades.
Chieftain of the Jiralhanae, Tartarus carries the Fist of Rukt to stun and pull enemy units toward him.
Heavy infantry unit that can sustain a lot of damage, and specializes at destroying buildings.
Prowlers are tough light vehicles that have a very strong ram ability, as well as a plasma turret capable of shredding enemy infantry.
Very quickly moving artillery unit that has the ability to fire a scorch blast to deal extra burn damage over time.
Chieftains' Gravity Hammers stun enemies when hit.
Chieftains gain the ability to pull enemy units towards them.
Chieftain's Gravity Hammers gain a much greater area of effect, allowing multiple units to be dealt damage on each attack.
Spectres gain the ability to boost quickly around the map.
Spectres can now use their boost to ram enemy ground units.
Spectres can strafe to avoid incoming projectiles.
Prowlers gain the ability to ram enemy ground units.
Two large spikes are added to the front of each Prowler, increasing the amount of damage inflicted using the ram ability.
Prowler Turrets are upgraded to fire quicker and deal more damage.
Allows Revenants to more effectively dodge incoming grenades and rockets.
Revenants mortars fire much more quickly, increasing their damage output.
Revenants gain the ability to fire a superheated plasma blast that leaves the surrounding terrain on fire.
Grunt Goblin's Needlers now occasionally cause a Supercombine explosion.
Goblins gain the ability to fire Heavy Explosive Needles from their Shardstorm Launcher.
Goblins gain a shield that absorbs incoming damage.
Goblins are well rounded light vehicles that are equipped an arm-mounted Heavy Needler and a Shardstorm Launcher.
Some Goliath attacks will toss enemy units around, interupting their attack.
Goliaths' armor is upgraded to deflect some incoming projectiles.
Adds another Marine to the squad.
Close-range counter-infantry unit armed with Needlers and Carbines.
Sword-wielding Elite Ultras that excel at dealing with enemies at close range.
Leader of the Separatist Heretic faction, Sesa 'Refumee wields Plasma Rifles and can deploy holograms of himself to decieve enemy units.
Heretic Grunt Lance that specialize in dealing with enemy vehicles.
An Elite wielding a Forerunner Sentinel Beam.

Bipedal vehicles equipped with a heavy needler, Gorgons excels against air units. Once upgraded, they gain the ability to launch a barrage of explosive Needles that cause the target to explode on death.
Massive, heavily armored vehicles originally created for mining, Protos Scarabs are capable of effortlessly decimating any target.
Sesa now dual wields Plasma Rifles, increasing his damage output.
Sesa's Holodrones become significantly cheaper to deploy.
Sesa gains access to a jetpack, allowing flight.
Increases the maximum number of Holodrones that Sesa 'Refumee can deploy by 1 (Max of 2).
Holodrones can be deployed much more quickly.
Increases the maximum number of Holodrones that Sesa 'Refumee can deploy by 1 (Max of 3).
Temporarily deploy a hologram of Sesa 'Refumee that can attack enemy units. Only a limited number of Holodrones can be deployed at any given time, and they will dissipate after a set amount of time.
Heretic Infantry have one additional Grunt.
Heretic Needler Grunts gain the ability to sometimes cause a Supercombine explosion when an enemy infantry unit is killed.
Upgrades the Elite leading this squad to Ultra, granting increased damage and resilience.
Heavy Heretic Lances will occasionally throw plasma grenades at enemy ground units.
Heavy Heretic Grunts' Fuel Rod Cannons now occasionally cause Corrosive damage over time.
Energy Swords are upgraded to output more energy, increasing their damage.
Adds a personal shield that decreases incoming damage.
Adds a personal shield that decreases incoming damage.
Upgrades Sentinel Beams to those used by Major Aggressor Sentinels, improving their damage output.
Aggressor Sentinels gain personal shields that absorb some incoming damage.
When destroyed, Aggressor Sentinels release an EMP blast that stuns and damages nearby enemy units.
Aggressor Sentinels' armor and weaponry are greatly upgraded.
Enforcer Sentinels gain the ability to grab vehicles with their claws.
Shadows become equipped with large gas containers that cause a large explosion when the vehicle is destroyed.
Shadow Plasma turrets are upgraded to Fuel Rod turrets.
Adds an energy shield that deflects some incoming damage.
Gorgons gain the ability to fire a volley of needles that cause a supercombine explosion if it kills an air unit.
Heavily modified variant of the Covenant Locust that is equipped with a plasma turret and fuel rod launcher in addition to the base beam emitter.
Deploy a hologram of this unit.
Modified Locusts gain the ability to attack while moving.
Modified Locusts gain the ability to unleash a volley of fuel rods against ground targets.
Modified Locusts' Beam Emitter gains a substantial damage increase.
Modified Shadows that carry a large gas container that detonates when the vehicle is destroyed.
Heretic Jackals led by an Elite.
Large Forerunner Sentinel with two turrets and a powerful laser attack.
Adds a heavy shield to Protector Sentinels.
Protector Sentinels gain the ability to fire a concentrated beam at ground units.
Adds extra shielding to deflect incoming projectiles.
Heretic Jackals are equipped with Plasma Rifles.
Another Heretic Jackal is added to the squad.
Mainline UNSC air unit outfitted with a chin-mounted autoturret, as well as two side turrets.
Adds two MG Turrets to each Falcon.
Falcon MG Turrets are replaced with Grenade Launcher Turrets.
Light vehicle whose Marine Passengers allow the vehicle to fire in multiple directions at once.
Adds 3 Marines armed with Assault Rifles to the back of the Warthog, allowing the unit to attack multiple targets at once.
Adds a Marine armed with a Grenade Launcher to improve attack strength.
All Marine passengers now wield Grenade Launchers, drastically improving the combat capabilities of this unit.
Adds a Marine passenger armed with an Assault rifle.
Upgrade Mongoose engines to allow for increased movement speeds.
The Marine passenger now uses a Rocket Launcher, drastically increasing Mongeese' damage output.
Lightly armored scout vehicle that can move around the battlefield at very high speeds.
Elites that use jetpacks to fly above the battlefield.
A group of small, unarmed Grunts to throw at your enemies.
Phantoms are used by the Covenant to transport infantry and vehicles to any location on the map.
Transport Phantoms gain a substantial speed increase. All Phantoms, including Assault Phantoms, gain increased hitpoints and damage.
Increases Transport Phantoms' carrying capacity from 6 population to 9 population. All Phantoms, including Assault Phantoms, gain increased hitpoints and damage.
Adds a Grenade Launcher attack to Jackrabbits.
A Drone hovers near Jackrabbits, improving their effectiveness in combat.
Jackrabbit Drones now have a beam attack.
Adds 2 more Grunts to each Cannon Fodder squad.
Power Nodes provide the energy needed to access advanced buildings, units and technology upgrades.
Scarab rigged with Methane canisters that causes a massive explosion when it dies.
Heavily modified Covenant Shadow that emits methane gas, buffing all Grunt units in its vicinity.
Add a row of seats that allows Infantry to garrison the Methane Wagon.
Methane Wagons leave behind pools of methane that buff nearby Grunt units, and dissipate after a short period of time.
Light Rebel Infantry equipped with Pistols and SMGs. They also passively throw grenades.
Tigers are lightly armored, but deal heavy damage with a cannon and eventually a missile turret.
Adds heavy armor plating to Tigers, increasing their defense and allowing them to deflect some projectiles.
Increases the rotation speed of the Tiger's turret, making them more responsive in combat.
Rebel Marksman trade their DMRs for Sniper Rifles, improving their damage output.
Sniper bullets now overpenetrate targets, allowing them to deal damage to multiple targets with each shot.
Adds another Rebel to the squad. This increases the combat effectiveness of the squad.
Rebels are now able to fire Grenade Launchers rather than throw Grenades.
Adds another Rebel to the squad. This increases the combat effectiveness of the squad.
Rebel Marksman trade their DMRs for Sniper Rifles, improving their damage output.
Sniper bullets now overpenetrate targets, allowing them to deal damage to multiple targets with each shot.
High-ranking Insurrectionist wielding both a GPMG and a Sniper Rifle, Castilla is a credible threat against a variety of units.
Castilla's armor now deflects some incoming small arms fire.
Castilla gains the ability to take a shot with her Sniper Rifle, dealing a lot of damage very quickly.
Castilla's GPMG now fires explosive rounds, allowing her to deal area damage.
Large Forerunner unit outfitted with pulse beams and grenade cannons.
Light Forerunner unit that does not engage in combat, but instead is used for repairing vehicles and buildings.
Aggressor Sentinels with more powerful Beam attacks and shielding than their lesser counterparts.
Heavy vehicle that can lockdown to release an electric wave that disables nearby vehicles. Additionally, Solenodons are completely resistant to being stunned.
Electricity produced by Solenodons now chains to nearby units.
Solenodons produce a higher voltage electric wave that fully stuns enemy vehicles and aircraft
Scout Vehicle that is able to Salvage vehicle rubble.
Heavy vehicle equipped with a large Anti-Air Railgun that charges up before firing. The Railgun can only target air units.
Anti-Vehicle unit equipped with a Grenade Launcher.
Grenadiers gain the ability to fire a Stun Grenade at Vehicles and Air units.
Adds burning chemicals to Grenades, causing extra damage over time.
Grenadiers are now equipped with Multishot Grenade Launchers, which may fire 6 times before reloading.
Allow this rubble to be scavenged for supplies. This choice is irreverisble.
Allow this rubble to be put back together by a Spade. This choice is irreverisble.
Destroyed vehicle that may be Scavenged for Supplies or Salvaged.
Spades are now outfitted with a turret bolted to their beds.
Increases the speed at which Spades are able to collect supplies, scavenge, and salvage.
Adds a Grenadier passenger to increase attack strength.
A pair of Rebels wielding DMRs.

Convert enemy units to your cause with the power of persuasion. Cannot surpass your population cap with this power, and it has no effect on Uber units, Leader units, High Value Infantry, Flood units, or Forerunner units.
The Rebel Supply Pad produces the resources needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades. Bases that have great economic production might have 7 Supply Pads.

The Rebel Heavy Supply Pad produces extra resources (compared to the default Supply Pad) needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades. Bases that have great economic production might have 7 Supply Pads.
The Barracks trains the bulk of the Rebel infantry units. Infantry technology upgrades can also be found here.
The Factory constructs the ground vehicles for the Rebel army. Vehicle technology upgrades can also be found here.
The Air Pad creates the various Rebel air units. Air unit technology upgrades can also be found here.
The Rebel Field Armory is a combination machine shop and high-tech laboratory. Many advanced technology upgrades can be found here.
Rebel Generators provide the energy needed to access advanced buildings, units and technology upgrades. High-tech bases may have as many as 2 or 3 Generators.

Rebel Advanced Generators provide twice as much energy (compared to default Generators) needed to access advanced buildings, units and technology upgrades. High-tech bases may have as many as 2 or 3 Generators.
This Generator provides enough energy to match the output of two Generators.
Use this to construct a new Outpost Base. Eventually, you can expand that into a full base.
Upgrades base to a Station, which adds two more building sites. Each building adds to the strength of the central structure.
Upgrades base to a Fortress, which adds two more building sites. Each building adds to the strength of the central structure.
Vipers can now attack while moving.
Improve Viper cooling systems to allow them to fire at an increased rate.
Converted units recover a modest amount of hitpoints.
Rebel Sympathizer gains an additional charge.
Combat Forms hitpoints and damage are increased.
Combat Forms hitpoints and damage are increased.
Combat Forms hitpoints and damage are increased.
Infected Air Units hitpoints and damage are increased.
Infected Air Units hitpoints and damage are increased.
Mark a location on the battlefield. This will allow Flood buildings to be constructed here.
Colonies are small Flood bases. They are able to build flood units, and provide a +20 unit population increase.
Expands the Colony by adding 2 build sites and 4 Flood Root sites.
Expands the Colony by adding 2 build sites.
Infected Air Units hitpoints and damage are increased.
Increases the number of Infection Forms from 3 to 5.
Increases the number of Infection Forms from 5 to 7.
Increases the health of Infection Forms.
Flood Form that rushes towards enemy units, detonating itself when it reaches its target. When it explodes, it releases infection forms.
A swarm of Flood forms from the shield world that specialize at taking down enemy air units.
A large Flood form from the shield world that uses its strength to defeat enemies, tossing them around with ease.
A group of Infection Forms whose sole purpose is to infect enemy infantry and scout units.
A cloud of Flood Spores that infect enemy units.
Creates and drops Flood Eggs on the battlefield, which burst to release Infection Forms.
Proto Graveminds provide access to a wide range of Flood units and provides +30 maximum population.
Use this to construct a new Small Flood Colony. Small Colonies provide a 20 population increase and have 3 Flood building sites.
Upgrades base to a Medium Flood Colony, which adds two building sites and 4 flood root sites. Also adds +5 to the population cap.
Upgrades base to a Large Flood Colony, which adds two building sites. Also adds +5 to the population cap.
Close ranged Combat Forms that are particularly good against infantry.
A Root that attacks nearby enemy units.
A Flood Egg that releases a Spore Cloud when it is killed.
Infected UNSC Scorpion that can stand toe-to-toe with the toughest enemies, but are mobile enough to get where theyre needed quickly.
Infected UNSC scout vehicle that has an MG turret and a ram ability.
Fast assault recon vehicle that can ram enemy units.
Infected Covenant Wraith, good speed and excellent range combine to make this a powerful ground vehicle.
A Large Flood Egg that releases a short ranged Spore Cloud when destroyed. Provides no function other than line of sight.
A Flood structure that builds pure Flood air units.
Launches Flood Spores at enemy units that infect them.
A Flood structure that builds pure Flood ground units. Gravemind Dens can produce infected ground units.
Flood Stalks produce the resources needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades.
Flood Power Stalks harvest the power from captured Forerunner Sentinels.
A very large Flood structure that can build infected Flood units.
Flood Stalk Clusters are a group of Flood Stalks, which produce the resources needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades..
A Root that attacks nearby enemy units.
Infected Marine wielding an Assault Rifle.
Infected Marine wielding a Shotgun that is strongest against infantry.
Infected Marine wielding a Sniper Rifle that can deal heavy damage to infantry from a distance.
Infected Marine that wields a SPNKR Rocket Launcher. They are best against vehicles and buildings.
Close ranged Combat Forms that are particularly good against infantry.
Infected Jackal that is good against infantry.
Infected Jackal that wields a Needler that shreds infantry.
Infected ODST wielding a silenced SMG.
Infected Grunt wielding a Plasma Pistol.
Infected Brute that wields a Brute Shot.
Infected Brute that wields a Brute Plasma Rifle.
Infected Elite wielding a Needler that shreds enemy infantry.
Thrasher Forms gain a passive ability to swipe attack infantry units, tossing them in the air and interupting their attack.
Enables Thrasher Forms to deflect incoming small arms fire.
Carrier Forms now infect enemy infantry when they explode.
Movement speed of Carrier Forms is increased.
More Infection Forms are released from Carrier Form detonations.
Infection forms spawned by Bombers have an increased lifespan.
Adds an additional 2 Infection Forms to each unit spawned by Bombers.
Flood Swarms move at an increased speed.
Adds an additional Flood Swarm to each unit.
Adds an additional Flood Swarm to each unit.
Power Stalk Clusters are the equivalent of two Power Stalks.
Adds two more Stalks, forming a Stalk Cluster.
Adds two more Stalks to the cluster.
Flood Ground vehicles' hitpoints and damage are increased.
Flood Ground vehicles' hitpoints and damage are increased.
Flood Ground vehicles' hitpoints and damage are increased.
Strong Flood pure form that uses its large claws to deal lots of melee damage.
Very agile pure form that is better suited for scouting than combat, they have the ability to cross certain otherwise impassible terrain.
Ranged Forms are incredibly slow, but are able to attack enemies from a long distance.
Tank Forms are upgraded to stun enemy units with each attack.
Tank Forms gain the ability to launch groups of Infection Forms at enemy units.
Stalker Forms' line of sight is greatly increased.
Enables Stalker Forms to quickly jump across the battlefield or over impassible terrain.
Stalker Forms' melee damage is greatly increased, making them much better in combat.
The attacks of Ranged Forms are moderately more effective against air.
Ranged Form attack range is increased.
Ranged Forms gain increased range and defense when garrisoned.
Flood Command Form that impales enemy units with is long, sharp tendrils. When a Juggernaut is killed, it releases a large number of Infection Forms
Massive Flood form that deals very high melee damage, and is even able to attack air units. Nearby allied units gain a damage bonus.
Juggernauts gain the ability to jump over other units or otherwise impassible terrain.
When they die, Juggernauts now release more Infection Forms and a Spore Cloud.
A small group of Combat Forms that are limited to melee attacks.
Well-rounded group of ranged Combat Forms.
Group of long-ranged Combat Forms that excel against infantry.
Combat Forms equipped with heavy weaponry capable of dealing lots of damage to vehicles.
Endless Flood Hordes. Survive as long as you can.
Light Flood Forms that can detonate itself to deal lots of damage to vehicles.
Aerial Flood Form that spits bones at enemy units. These bones are particularly effective against Air units.
Large Flood Forms that launch Infection Forms at enemy units.
Infestors incubate Infection Forms, releasing them on death.
Infestors' death explosion now stuns nearby units.
Seeder Forms are now able to dodge projectiles.
Seeder Forms now spit much strong bones, which are now able to pierce through targets.
Spawner Forms can now launch Seeder Forms at Air units and Infestor Forms at vehicles.
Increases the rate at which Spawner Forms can use their Flood Spawn ability.
The Flood becomes a far greater threat.
Deploys 3 EMP Troopers to target location. Armed with heavy EMP beam weapons, EMP Troopers specialize at stun-locking enemy vehicles, and are themselves completely resistant to being stunned.
Hire Jackal Pirates to aid your troops in battle. They are equipped with Energy Daggers and Defense Gauntlets, and are particularly effective against infantry.
Deploys a group of Armored Marines to target location. Equipped with deflective armor, these Marine are much tougher than their standard counterparts.
Deploys 2 Grizzly tanks to target location. Armed with Dual-Cannons and a Missile Launcher, Grizzlies are a threat to any other unit on the battlefield.
Deploys 2 Flamethrowers and 1 Flame Warthog to target location.
Temporarily reveals an area of the map.
Deploys 2 Aggressor Sentinels and 1 Super Sentinel to target location.
Deploys 3 Flood Combat Forms to target location.
Deploys 3 Spec-Ops Grunt Lance to target location. Fully cloaked, these units are ideal for surprise attacks.
Hotdrops an Elite General, Elite Zealot, or an Elite Field Marshal to target location.
Deploys an Assault Phantom to the target location to defend an area for a short time.
Deploys 3 Brute Stalkers to target location. Brute Stalkers are fully cloaked and specialize against infantry.
Deploys a Brute Chieftain accompanied by Brute Honor Guards to target location.
Deploys Silent Shadow to target location. These Elites are particularly effective at killing high-value infantry units. This power can only be used if you do not currently have any Silent Shadow.
Deploys a pair of Goliaths to target location.
A Sacrifice I am Willing to Make
Deploys Bomb Grunts to target location. These Grunts carry large bombs that detonate when in close proximity to enemy units.
Deploys Cannon Fodder to target location.
Drop canisters full of Flood at target location. These Flood units are hostile to all players.
Holy Warriors of the Sacred Rings
Deploys Aggressor Sentinels and an Enforcer to target location.
Call in Spirits to transport a small group of units from one place to another.
Call in Seraphs to transport a small group of units from one place to another.
Call in Phantoms to transport a small group of units from one place to another.
Deploys various Heretic Infantry units to target location.
A Flood Root emerges from target location.
Adds a Combat Medic to the squad. The Medic heals the squad after combat. Also unlocks the standalone Combat Medic, who heals nearby friendly infantry units.
Grunt Lances are upgraded to be led by Elite Officers, rather than Minors.
Upgrades Warthog machine gun. Improves damage and defense.
Grunt Lances gain a Grunt Ultra. Ultras are significantly better in combat than Grunt Minors and inspire them. This will improve the Grunt Lance's overall combat effectiveness.
Specialty troops, wielding energy swords and using cloaks these units are best tearing infantry apart from surprise.
Specialized, heavy infantry with powerful Brute Shots, these squads dish out lots of damage.
Counter-infantry unit, often armed with sniper rifles, Jackals can make quick work of enemy infantry.
An infantry focused UNSC leader that takes advantage of his ability to impact the battlefield from orbit. Leader Power: MAC Blast. Bonus: Bases start at one higher tech level.
UNSC leader that favors expensive, heavy vehicles and a strong economy. Leader Power: Carpet Bomb. Bonus: Builds Heavy Supply Pads right away.
UNSC leader that specializes at disabling enemy units and controlling the battlefield. Leader Power: Cryo Bomb Bonus: All unit upgrades are half-price and research in half the time.
Flood leader that dominates the map by drowning it in Flood structures. Bonus: Bases increase population cap.
Insurrectionist leader that specializes at making the most use out of what is available. Leader Power: Rebel Sympathizer. Bonus: Can Salvage or Scavenge some destroyed vehicles.
Covenant Leader that specializes at sneaking units behind enemy lines. Leader Power: Rage.
Covenant leader that favors strong units. Leader Power: Vortex.
Covenant leader that excels at oppressing opponents' bases and high-value units. Leader Power: Cleansing.
Grunt leader whose units are generally weaker than those of other leaders, but at a cheaper price. Leader Power: Builds Structures.
Covenant Separatist leader that utilizes a combination of Heretic and Forerunner units. Leader Power: Release the Flood.
Focus: High tech units and map control, Leader Power: Building Drop, Bonus: Has the ability to place buildings around the map.
Use this to create unbalanced teams or to spectate the match. The player is instantly defeated when the match begins.
Use this to create unbalanced teams or to spectate the match. The player is not instantly defeated, allowing them to spectate AI matches.
Light Forerunner air unit that has a Beam attack and a defensive shield.
On the surface of a mysterious Shield World, factions of a galaxies past roam freely. Be the last one standing and declare yourself the most dangerous military the galaxy has ever seen.

The area is dominated by large mountains and chasms, but there are still many possible approaches to traverse the rugged landscape. Scattered Sniper Towers are positioned perfectly to defend key tactical locations.
A fast and brutal fight awaits in Blood Gulch. Teleporters allow for surprise attacks, while bonus Reactors offer opportunities for the aggressive.

THREAT LEVEL: GREEN Ultranationalist Rebels have control over this zone. They're spread thin, should be easy pickings. Also, their reactors and base locations will be prime real estate for our forces to take, let's get it done.
The Flood threatens to overrun this dangerous but crucially important sector and with reports of some sort of a "containment lock" in the region, taking back the area may prove difficult.
Difficult terrain channels units into killing zones. However, preplaced teleporters bypass those zones and plant you right on your opponents doorstep.
Secure base locations on nearby cliffs overlook this naturally red-tinged river. To some it has been dubbed Blood River, but the upcoming battle will determine if that name shall stick.

THREAT LEVEL: YELLOW An extremist rebel cell has taken over this locale. Dubbed "Castillas Retreat," this sector was home to Castilla and served as the FOB for the loyalist URF. Early reports talk of an experimental weapon in the area, stay vigilant.
The swampy outskirts of Arcadia's capital city features opposing factions with a surplus of resources, ready for the taking. Fast-paced combat and quick battles are commonplace here.
On a strange world, an ancient evil looms. Hunker down and fend for your life as the parasite approaches...

This densely built-up urban region of Arcadia features several Oni Towers protecting key areas. Reports indicate there's an extremist Rebel cell that has taken up positions deeper in the city, be weary.
The high ground in the middle is essential to controlling the battlefield, while the open terrain transforms organized battle plans into bloodbaths.
With many supplies up for grabs in the middle and dangerous enemies lurking everywhere, the fight for control of this region will be nasty, brutal, and short.

Deep in the Arcadian bog, the advance towards the final stronghold commences. Those stationed in the region need to watch their flanks and hold the line. Taking control over the leftover defenses and garrisons is a must.
A maze of Forerunner structures creates a complex and challenging battlefield. Holding the Light Walls and utilizing the Forerunner Protector units may hold the key to victory.
In the fight to save Arcadia, one final stronghold remains. High tech teleporters and the surrounding garrisons will be necessary to overcome the opposing siege.

Scattered remains of a UNSC outpost are present in this Arctic Wasteland. Sources say that a healing structure of unknown origins as well as Reactors and Supply Towers can be found amongst the besieged frontier.

A long forgotten island found on the exterior of the Shield World has been overrun. On it, lies a set of 3 rings that escalate in danger the further you go down, with an abundance of supplies at the bottom, along with a plethora of Flood...

THREAT LEVEL: RED This glacial region contains the Ultranationalistic United Rebel Fronts main base of operations. They have a heavy presence in the area; be on the lookout for anything as they will surely have assets in place, ready to repel any attack.

This seaside district of the main city on Arcadia is a sight to behold. Featuring landing pads for ferries and a tram system for the public, it has everything a city goer could want, minus the upcoming chaos that's about to ensue.

The Covenant surrounds the UNSC's Alpha Base on the planet Harvest. They plan to use this location for its Forerunner tech as well as a staging ground for their operations in the Arcadian Colonies. They must be stopped...

"This bore site has been noted for its cryptic findings, many of which have aided in Castilla's campaign. However, one such finding has the entire galaxy by its throat, with many saying they should've left it in the ice. Move in, secure the area, and burn what's left, contact us when it's done." [OUT]

"With the Dig Site in ruins; new data has led us to Eridanus. A volcanic planet, the climate is very harsh and those posted there are more so. The mercs of Eagles Syndicate have taken up refuge on the planet. Hiring them will prove vital in taking control over the region." [ACKNOWLEDGE]
Select an area to launch a barrage of missiles at. Requires LOS to use.
The Echidna is a re-designed rhino tank with a built in flamethrower that is perfect for locking down an area against a mass armada of infantry units and other small targets.
Pulled out from its retirement, the Leopard is a fast but medium armor tank that has the ability to dish out massive damage against single targets.
The Porcupine is a heavy artillery unit that has the capability to target both air and ground units. It fires a barrage of missiles and can stand on its own against armies of all types.

A relic of a different time, the Hippo is the perfect vehicle to control the field and bring its enemies to their knees. Being a mobile barracks for mercenaries and having the firepower of an army, no one will survive its wrath.
A heavily outfitted mercenary wielding a turret. The MG Merc can deflect shots from small arms fire and has a ton of armor that allows them to deal with many foes.
A standard mercenary squad that comes equipped with BRs and a surplus of grenades. They are perfect for most mainline duties as well as taking on vehicles when amassed.
Mercenary captains are not threats to be trifled with. They are heavily experienced soldiers and have stun grenade launchers which are perfect for taking on any and all that stand before them.
All newly trained units will move to this location when training is completed. You can set a Base Rally Point to direct a specific bases units someplace else.
A new support power is available to select
Repair or reinforce the selected units
Tell any units you have garrisoned in this cover object to get out and return to normal combat mode.
Units train as normal, but are garrisoned inside the base instead of exiting into the world. UNLOCK will release all the garrisoned units at once.
Release any garrisoned units and return base training to normal.
New units from this base will move to this location when training is complete. Use the Global Rally Point to override this behavior.
Instantly destroy this entire base to free it up for an ally.
Upgrades base to a Station, which adds two more building sites. Each building adds to the strength of the central structure.
Upgrades base to a Fortress, which adds two more building sites. Each building adds to the strength of the central structure.
Supply production massively increased for this Supply Pad.
This Reactor provides enough energy to match the output of two Reactors.
Adds a light auto-cannon to all Elephants. This turret is only operable when the Elephant is deployed.
Adds another Marine to the squad. This increases the combat effectiveness of the squad.
Marine active Grenade Ability upgraded to active Rocket Ability. Rockets can attack from a longer range than Grenades.
Adds a turret attack to the Warthogs, giving them combat capability.
Adds a Marine armed with a Grenade Launcher to improve attack strength.
Improves Wolverine damage and defense (for now).
Enables the active Volley Ability on Wolverines. The Volley Ability can be used to deal big damage to buildings.
Improves Scorpion damage and defense (for now).
Equips Scorpions with a secondary Canister Shell attack. This attack is devastating to any infantry in its blast area.
Adds a couple of Marines riding shotgun to augment damage capabilities.
Improves Cobra damage and defense (for now).
Hardened steel plates give the Cobra extra protection when locked down.
Increases the attack and defense of your Leader.
Upgrades Base Turrets and Shade Turrets, increasing their hitpoints and damage. Also increases Sniper Towers' hitpoints.
Upgrades Base Turrets and Shade Turrets, increasing their hitpoints and damage. Also increases Sniper Towers' hitpoints.
Upgrades all Turrets, increasing their hitpoints and damage. Also increases Watchtowers' hitpoints and Line of Sight.
Upgrades all Turrets, increasing their hitpoints and damage. Also increases Watchtowers' hitpoints and Line of Sight.
Upgrades base to a Keep, which adds two building sites.
Upgrades base to a Citadel, which adds two building sites.
Grunt Lances have one additional Grunt.
Adds extra shielding to deflect incoming projectiles.
Jackals are now equipped with particle beam rifles.
Equips each Hunter with a huge shield that can deflect many projectiles.
Hunters get a big damage boost while both bond brothers are alive.
Enables the Boosted Ram Ability on Ghosts, allowing them to effectively ram their targets.
Allows Ghosts to more effectively dodge incoming grenades and rockets.
Increases the rate of fire for the Banshees weapons.
Stasis Ability now drains target hitpoints and heals the Vampire.
Adds an energy shield that deflects some incoming damage.
Enables the Scorch Ability that superheats an area of terrain for extra damage.
Train times for all units are drastically reduced.
Booster shots enable all infantry units to run at significantly increased speeds.
An extra rocket pod gives Wolverines considerably more damage potential.
Increases the rotation speed for Scorpion turrets, making them considerably more responsive in combat.
Hornets gain the passive Chaff Ability that is used to distract and divert incoming missiles.
Cobra railguns gain extra power to allow them to punch through multiple targets, inflicting damage on each.
Modifies Turret into an anti-infantry shade Turret.
Modifies Turret into an anti-air heavy needler Turret.
Modifies Turret into an anti-ground vehicle Turret.
Enables the Locust Overdrive Ability. This ability uses the Locusts shield generator output to overcharge its beam weapon. Attack power is drastically increased at the expense of the Locusts shields.
Upgrade the production capacity of this Warehouse to produce more supplies.
Increases the attack and defense of your Leader.
Increases the attack and defense of your Leader.
Adds bonus Anti-Infantry attack to the Turret.
Adds bonus Anti-Vehicle attack to the Turret.
Adds bonus Anti-Air attack to the Turret.
Adds +10 to the population cap of your army.
Adds front-firing 35mm guns, improving the Choppers attack.
Brute Majors are promoted to Jump Pack Brutes, allowing them to cross impassable terrain.
Increases the maximum size of your army by 10.
Marines are the main UNSC infantry unit. They are good against most everything. They have an active Grenade Ability that can eventually be upgraded to an active Rocket Ability.
Mainline troop, slow and short range, yet still the best returns per cost in combat.
ODSTs are an elite version of UNSC Marines. They excel at everything a Marine is good at, but can also be hot-dropped anywhere on the battlefield from Spirit of Fire.

Prototype UNSC super soldiers, the Spartans possess extreme combat skills. Spartans have an active ability to Jack enemy vehicles and Commandeer friendly vehicles. This boosts the combat power of those vehicles.
Warthogs are the UNSCs Main Vehicle units. They are outfitted with a Machine Gun turret and can ram enemy units.
Scorpions are the main UNSC tank. They can stand toe-to-toe with the toughest enemies, but are mobile enough to get where theyre needed quickly.
Anti-air missile pods cover the UNSC Wolverines shell. Devastatingly effective against air units, Wolverines can also unleash a fusillade of rockets against buildings.
The Plasma Rhino is a secret UNSC weapon just now entering field tests. Unpacking the Rhino turns it into a long-range artillery unit that fires heated plasma, decimating anything it hits.
Mainline air unit, the Hawk is a sophisticated laser-armed attack craft.
Vultures are the most advanced UNSC war machine. Costly to produce, the Vultures dish out damage at an alarming rate.
Mainline troop, slow and short range yet still the best returns per cost in combat.
Heavy counter-vehicle units wielding powerful fuel rod cannons, Hunters are a credible threat even against tanks.
Leader of the Covenant forces, the Arbiter is equipped with dual plasma swords for uber-melee death.
Mainline battle tank, good speed and excellent range combine to make this a powerful ground vehicle.
Massive vehicles have a devastating beam that can tear apart virtually anything.
Mainline air unit, Banshees are armed with both plasma cannons and fuel rod cannons. Arbiters Banshees do not have the Sacrifice ability, but instead can be upgraded to dodge incoming projectiles.
Counter-air aircraft, heavy needler turret can track and engage enemy air in a large area.
Pyromaniacs to the core, UNSC Flamethrowers burn up any organic thing they can find. They excel at killing all infantry units.
Counter-building vehicle, very slow and best set to destroying unprotected enemy bases.

The UNSC Cobra is an incredibly effective anti-vehicle threat. Its fast and agile against vehicles, but also has an active Unpack Ability that turns the Cobra into a long-range artillery unit that is excellent against buildings.
Specialty troops that guard the Prophets. They provide a buff to nearby Leaders and High Value Infantry units.
The UNSC Grizzly is a beefed-up version of the Scorpion. The Grizzly is even better at killing everything than the Scorpion, and starts with dual cannons and the ability to fire canister shells.
Heal any units and repair any buildings in an area.
Use the UNSC Shortsword Bomber to drop Cryo Bombs in an area, freezing all things for a short time.
Use the UNSC Shortsword Bomber to drop a high number of anti-infantry mines in an area.
Use the UNSC Shortsword Bomber to devastate a strip of land with massive bombs.

Disrupts existing Leader Powers and prevents new Leader Powers from being initiated in a small area for 1 minute. Unit Drop powers, the Rebel Sympathizer power, and building placement powers are unaffected.
Call in Pelicans to transport a small group of units from one place to another.
Call in Pelicans to transport a small group of units from one place to another.
Use Spirit of Fire's awesome Mass Accelerated Cannons to incinerate enemy troops.
Select an area to bomb with a shortsword bomber.
Although they cannot be fired near enemy Jammers, tactical missiles can be devastating against enemy troops and buildings.
Select an area for the Mega Turret to fire on.
Select a location to lay a minefield.
Rhino locks down increasing range and damage.
Long-range beam attack that does bonus damage against buildings.
Basic unsc with no leader bonuses. *for testing purposes only*
Basic covenant with no leader bonuses. *for testing purposes only*
You can request to have a small base dropped in from orbit. Eventually, you can expand that into a full base.
All new units will move to this location when their training is complete. The Global Rally Point overrides existing Base Rally Points.
UNSC Reactors provide the energy needed to access advanced buildings, units and technology upgrades. High-tech bases may have as many as 2 or 3 Reactors.
The Covenant Warehouse produces the resources needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades. Bases that have great economic production might have 7 Warehouses.
The UNSC Supply Pad produces the resources needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades. Bases that have great economic production might have 7 Supply Pads.

The UNSC Heavy Supply Pad produces extra resources (compared to the default Supply Pad) needed to train units, build buildings, and buy technology upgrades. Bases that have great economic production might have 7 Supply Pads.

UNSC Advanced Reactors provide twice as much energy (compared to default Reactors) needed to access advanced buildings, units and technology upgrades. High-tech bases may have as many as 2 or 3 Reactors.
The UNSC Field Armory is a combination machine shop and high-tech laboratory. Many advanced technology upgrades can be found here.
The Barracks trains the bulk of the UNSC infantry units. Infantry technology upgrades can also be found here.
The UNSC Vehicle Depot constructs the ground vehicles for the UNSC army. Vehicle technology upgrades can also be found here.
The Air Pad creates the various UNSC air units. Air unit technology upgrades can also be found here.
Use this to construct a new Outpost Base. Eventually, it can be upgraded to a full Citadel, increasing your ability to crush the evil enemy filth.
Covenant aircraft are constructed at the Summit. Aircraft upgrades are also in this structure.
The Covenant Hall rallies infantry units to the cause. Upgrades for infantry units are also housed here.
Most Covenant vehicles are pieced together and upgraded at the Factory.
An extremely powerful turret that can fire on any location on the map. The bombard attack has a cooldown that must pass before the turret can be fired again.
Generates a large bubble shield to protect the base. Multiple Shield Generators can be built in a base to compound the shields strength.
Use the building sites to build Extractors and Turrets
Use the building sites to build Energy Extractors and Turrets
Use the building sites to build Energy Extractors and Turrets
Use the building sites to build Supply Extractors and Turrets
Use the building sites to build Supply Extractors and Turrets
Use infantry to capture this site which can be used to produce supplies
Use infantry to capture this site which can be used to produce power
Attack this site to force it back to neutral
Use Marines to Destroy Barrier Power Source
Hornets are the main UNSC air unit. They come armed with Gatling cannons and explosive rockets giving them more than adequate offense against most any enemy.
Protect Civilians and Cargo Transports until Launch
The downtown subway exit is under attack. We need to hold that area!
Cargo ONE is not responding. Transport assumed lost. Focus all attention on Cargo TWO
Cargo TWO is down. Cargo ONE MUST SURVIVE!
Get Bravo Platoon to the Landing Zone
Spirit of Fires ground forces are scattered and disorganized. Covering their retreat and evacuation is the highest priority.
Spirit of Fire is being drawn against her will into the belly of a hostile planet. Ground forces deployed to the planets surface will be abandoned if Spirit of Fire doesnt act quickly...
Get Alpha Platoon to the Landing Zone
Use an Elephant to Tow the Core up to the Apex Base Site
Build and Attach Elephant to FTL Reactor Core
Optional: Take Control of the Scarab
So. What? No 'thanks for rescuing me, Sergeant?'
Later! The Covenant are assembling a huge fleet!
Suddenly this LZ doesn't look so good. Spirit, we're gonna need back up.
Let's get out of here. I saw a teleporter over there!
Spirit of Fire, we are ready for transport. Anders, stay by that beacon.
Get a Rhino to the Marked Position
Get the Rhino to the First Position
Place a Rhino at the Marked 2nd Position
Transport a Rhino to the Marked 3rd Position
Get Rhinos to the Last Two Marked Positions
Spartan Red Team reporting in. Sergeant, we will flank the enemy and move to your location.
Spartan Red Team reporting in. Where do you want us, Sergeant?
Optional: Find and Rescue Pinned Marines
Defend the Crater until Omega Team Arrives
Fast-paced gameplay where taking the high ground may be the difference between life and death.
Bases in this region tend to have two ways in and out. Controlling the center may lead to a larger-than-normal population limit.
Battle inside the Relic, the side that comes out on top will control the Artifact below.
Fast-paced gameplay where taking the high ground may be the difference between life and death.
A frozen pond and several craters channel troop movements into killing zones in this battle-scarred region.
Large bodies of water leave narrow choke points between you and your enemies.
Barren lands leave few natural defenses for your base and there is a node with many sockets located in the center.
Improves Cyclops damage and defense (for now).
Equips each Cyclops with tools to heal mechanized units and buildings.
Massively improved mobility systems increases movement speed of each Cyclops.
Battle from platform to platform traversing space via your transport power while losing air superiority may cost you the war.
Increases damage inflicted when the Chopper runs over enemies, and decreases the damage taken.
Jackal shields do not collapse when taking damage.
Equips Hunters with a devastating beam-based weapon.
Adds an energy shield to Ghosts that deflects some incoming damage.
Banshees attempt to crash into ground targets and inflict area damage when destroyed.
When a target is drained with the Stasis Ability, it explodes, doing area-effect damage.
Greatly increases the damage of the Wraith's Plasma Mortar.
Locust shields regenerate much more quickly.
Improves flying artillery damage and defense
The Brute Shot causes electrical stun damage when it hits.
Fight your Way to Forge and Anders' Location
Increases energy rate at all Monuments.
Increases energy rate at all Monuments.
Increases energy rate at all Monuments.
Bases in this region must be heavily defended at night, when Flood Swarms emerge from their hiding places.
Enemies might be hiding around every corner on this map where large Forerunner structures dominate the landscape
Equips Flamethrowers with active Flash Bang ability that stuns any enemy infantry for a short time.
Slow-burning, sticky napalm burns enemies for several seconds after the initial attack.
An advanced, higher burn point fuel increases damage to all organic units.
Improves building armor and defensive Turret damage
Improves building armor and defensive Turret damage
Improves building armor and defensive Turret damage
Improves infantry damage by cannons fired by Scorpions, Hawks, Badger teams,and Cannon Turrets.
Improves vehicle damage by Cannons fired by Scorpions, Hawks, Badger teams,and Cannon Turrets.
Further reduces market and tribute penalty
Increases Energy production by 1/3 but decreases supplies production by 1/3
Machine gun bullets increased damage against aircraft
Elite Honor Guards now dual wield.
Adds a personal shield that decreases incoming damage. When Elite Honor Guards' shield is low, they will go berserk, drawing their sword and charging at enemy units at an increased speed.
Equips Spartans with two-handed auto-guns for dramatically increased damage.
Improved reflexes allow Spartans to Jack enemy vehicles much more effectively.
The ultimate UNSC handheld weapon gives Spartans a distinct combat advantage.
Extractors and turrets can be built here.
Only Extractors can be built here.
A new base is cleared for placement here
Recycle this building and return some supplies back to your bank.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades Turret damage.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades Turret damage.
Add shields to all buildings and upgrades Turret damage.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat ends.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat ends.
Shields regen faster and sooner after combat ends.
Increases the shields that captured nodes have when upgraded.
Increases the shields that captured nodes have when upgraded.
Further reduces market and tribute penalty
Adds bonus Anti-Infantry attack to the Turret.
Adds bonus Anti-Vehicle attack to the Turret.
Adds bonus Anti-Air attack to the Turret.
Elephant speed is greatly improved by the addition of a second engine.
An additional set of composite alloy plates boost the Elephant's damage mediation.
Battle over a node heavy center; although you can gain a major econ boost, you can not build Turrets there.
Sergeant, we have to stop the Covenant...
John, I... I think I know how to stop the Covenant! I need to get to my lab!
Baby steps, Professor. Let's try not dying first.
Finally! Sergeant, I need you to stay down here and get this area locked down.
Well, whaddya know? Locked down is my specialty.
Well, lookee there. The Covenant abandoned a Scarab. Wonder if they left the keys in it?
You know, they really shouldn't leave their toys lying around.
Help text stand-in for Mega Turret.
Hold off the Flood until your men can evac.
Doubles the number of missiles in each salvo of the active Barrage Ability.
Urban warfare on a galactic scale; controlling the center paths may be difficult since you cannot build on top of them.
War has left very few structures intact on this piece of rock, but its still our rock...
Battle around hot geysers on barren Harvest.
Player can build a second Scarab.
Brute Choppers and Brute Tanks have increased trample damage *not active atm*
Brutes, Brute Choppers, and Brute Tanks train faster
Brutes, Brute Choppers, and Brute Tanks are cheaper
Brutes, Brute Choppers and Brute Tanks deal more damage against buildings.

Leader of the Covenant forces, the Prophet of Regret also brings unique combat abilities to the battlefield. In addition to his combat strength, he can call down the Cleansing Power to incinerate his enemies.
Sergeant Forge must try to help scattered groups of pinned-down soldiers and retake Alpha Base.
With the area around Alpha Base secure, the base must be brought back online. Military units must then be trained and sent to investigate the relic.
Anders and Forge have been cut off inside the structure. They must be rescued.
The Covenant has attacked Arcadia in force, and the civilian population is evacuating. Spirit of Fire's ground troops will provide cover.
Covenant forces have overrun the city. Spirit of Fire's troops must fall back and hold a defensive position until Omega Team arrives.
The Covenant have constructed a large energy dome on Arcadia. Enemy forces must be defeated and the dome destroyed.
The dome was protecting a Covenant super weapon. Ground units must be sent in to finish the job.
Readings from the planet's surface are highly unusual. The advance forces must be covered and protected while they investigate.
Anders' transponder signal has been detected. She must be found and rescued before it is too late.
Get Charlie Platoon to the Landing Zone
Mysterious alien infection forms threaten Spirit of Fire. They must be cleansed from the ship's hull before they penetrate the interior.
A Covenant destroyer has sideswiped Spirit of Fire. The ship must be repaired and Covenant forces must be driven back.
It is vital that Anders returns to Spirit of Fire. She must be protected and escorted to the LZ.
The shield world must not fall into Covenant hands. Spirit's reactor core has been removed and will be used to destroy the entire facility.
The reactor core must be brought to the Apex. At the same time, a way for Spirit of Fire to escape must be found.
Forge rallies the troops and retakes Alpha Base
Get Alpha Base up and running and find out what the Covenant were up to.
Forge and Anders are trapped inside the relic. They must be rescued.
The Covenant invasion of Arcadia is in full swing. Evacuation of its civilian population is the UNSC's top priority.
The civilian evacuation is complete. UNSC forces must safely withdraw from the city.
Uncover what the Covenant were after on Arcadia.
Send in ground units to destroy a Covenant super weapon.
Forge and Recon Groups ECHO and INDIA start the search for Anders.
Find Anders and rescue her before it is too late.
Cleanse the infection forms from Spirit's hull before they penetrate the interior.
Repair Spirit of Fire and drive Covenant forces back.
Protect Anders and escort her to the LZ.
Pull the reactor core to the Apex site.
Help Spirit of Fire's crew escape from the Shield World.
If we can hold them at this river, maybe we can keep them out of the city.
Frozen tundra leave few natural defenses for your base, but that means few for your enemies as well.
Destroy the Covenant Base and its Guards
Three platoons inbound. Designating them Alpha, Bravo and Charlie.
They're with Charlie, sir... that could be a problem.
We can't evac those trapped Marines until the air is clear. Let's be about it, people.
Sorry, I can't help you right now.
Give me a minute then I will help you.
Look what the enemy is doing... there.
Can you help me defend... here?
Can you help me attack... here?
I want to claim this node.
I am going to try to boom (focus on resources and upgrades).
I am going to try to turtle (focus on defenses).
I am going to try to rush (focus on military).
I am going to kick your ass with vehicles.
I am going to kick your ass with infantry.
I am going to kick your ass with air.
Alpha Base, this is Bravo 29 heavy inbound. I've got the professor aboard.
Alpha Base, this is Bravo 29. I can drop reinforcements at that landing pad if you can remove all hostiles in that area for me.
Take cover in those downed Pelicans! Move!
We must take the relic in one piece. Let's regroup and start over.
Covenant energy barriers can be taken down by destroying their power source.
I'm picking up lots of Covenant chatter around your position - looks like they are setting up defenses.
If the Covenant detonate those explosives our mission here is over. Get to the detonator!
Good work. Prepare for new orders.
Serina, see if you can buy us more time. Sergeant, break through that line for our Pelicans.
This is Alpha Platoon - we've got hostile contacts. LOTS of hostile contacts.
This is Alpha Platoon - we can't hold our position much longer.
This is Alpha Platoon! We're being overrun!
This is Bravo Platoon. Sergeant, would you kindly get off your ass and save ours?
This is Bravo Platoon. Get over here, man!
I'm too pretty to go like this!
This is Spartan 92 at Charlie Platoon. They're hammering our postion.
Sergeant Forge, this is Charlie. We can't take much more of this.
Dig in men - this is our last stand.
All clear! Evac flight, start your run.
This is Red Team. We're staying dirtside to give you a hand, Sergeant.
Maybe we should get some turrets up?
Hey, thanks for that, Sergeant. Need a Grizzly?
Aerial hostiles on an intercept course! Evac flight, abort! Repeat, Evac flight, abort, abort!
This is Alpha Platoon. We're on our way. Save us a seat!
This is Bravo Platoon. We can hoof it, if we have to.
This is Charlie Platoon, we'll come in on our own. Keep those engines hot.
Captain, those pylons down there are generating the field we're in.
Way ahead of you, sir. Forge, I'm sending you a new toy. A Gremlin. Drive it over to that pylon.
Forge, I'm sending you a new toy. A Gremlin. Drive it over to that pylon.
Recalculating speed of descent... carry the 4... and... we... might just make it!
Sergeant, we're running out of time. Use the Gremlin, Sergeant - I didn't send it down there for my amusement.
Pylon sighted. Marking on your display.
All ground forces present and accounted for, Captain.
Good work. Serina, final evac from planet surface inbound. Prep airlocks.
Damnit. I didn't come all this way to lose the professor.
Captain, the area is locked down. Anders done with her skull session?
The professor's filled me in. Good work, Sergeant. Stand by for mission briefing.
Pathetic fools. You do not even realize that you are all dead.
I think he's scared of us.
Oh no! That thing followed me!
I am the Arbiter - I am your death!
Well, lookee there - I wonder if the keys are still in it.
The Covenant really shouldn't leave their toys lying around.
Bah, looks like we need another Elephant. We need to get this thing up those ramps.
Elephants lost. Get another one to replace it
That's the wreckage from the Prophecy. All hands lost.

More Marines. Good. We need to get the barrier down and clean out Alpha.
Bring the Warthogs up into the fight.
Finally, the rescue party's here! Ooh-rah!
This is Tango Three Three. We're under heavy fire!
That turret is chewing us up!
Thought we were dead for sure. Ooh-rah!
Tango One Four, you need to get us outta here!

Eww! We got Grunt bits all in the grill!
Time for some payback. Run 'em over!
We're getting torn up pretty bad.

Well now, that was the most fun I've had all week.

Warthogs can't get through but footsoldiers can. Get this thing down and we'll come a-runnin'.

Fall in behind me. We're taking Alpha back!

Alpha must be pretty messed up. More survivors ahead.
Hang on, Marine - we're on our way!

Well, look at that. They're trying to keep us out of our own base.

Good job. We successfully evacuated some civilians from Arcadia.
Press $$A$$ over the unit you want to repair, then press $$A$$.
Patrol here. We've got those civilians pretty well directed to the ships.

Evacuation proceeding. Make sure civilian security level 4 and above are priority.
Red Team. Point two four, one one seven tango ground operation beta advise.
Spirit of Fire, Forge here. Please advise on evacuation plan.
T minus 5,4,3,2, LAUNCH. All systems green. Clearing launch platform. Good luck down there.
I've marked some locations suitable for base deployment. Make sure the area is clear!
Spirit of Fire, this is Arcadian Patrol, civilians entering the city are getting blocked by hostile forces. We need to clear that area, can you assist?
Cargo THREE. I gotta get this bird in the air soon! We're dead down here!

Congratulations. We were able to evacuate a great many innocent civilians from Arcadia.

Cargo TWO is under enemy attack. Don't leave us out here to die!
Cargo ONE is taking heavy fire. Requesting assistance.

Cargo TWO. Reporting hits of small arms fire on the hull!
Cargo ONE. We are taking fire!
Spirit of Fire, Red Team. The Covenant are gaining control of the city fast. Suggest setting up new ground operations.
Red Team here. We'll cover the transports. Just get those civilians up here!

Once the core reaches a flat area, it will no longer be in danger of rolling back down the hill. Get the core to level ground...and do try to avoid any unnecessary jostling.
If that Elephant gets destroyed on the ramp, the core will roll all the way back down. It's not going to be pretty.
Towing unit is lost! Reactor is rolling back down! Watch your toes!
Clear the way! FTL is cut free and sliding back!

Engineering has uncoupled the FTL core. I've ordered Pelicans to carry it up to the Hang onThis isn't right...

Sergeant, engineers are on their way to rig the core. We're nearly there.

Spirit, we have reached the target site. Orders?
... This is Victor 397! Stabilizers out! We can't carry her! Going down! Clear the area, we are dropping cargo!

Lock Down Elephant to Train Troops $$Y$$

ECHO here, we've got a slight malfunction in our...Somethings gotten into...

ECHO reporting..Everythin..Wait..What was that...Just over the rock line...

Hostiles clear. Let's move - it's getting darker out here.

Sergeant, take a team out there and find out what's happening.

Sergeant, logistics are preventing reinforcements. Train squads out of that Elephant.
All Elephants are home. Hold for new orders.
We lost an Elephant. We need all Elephants intact to continue on. Regroup.
I wouldn't recommend getting too close to those things. You won't like what happens next.
Designation "Jiralhanae," a.k.a. Brutes, responsible for the attack on Harvest.
Elephant getting pounded on! Get some backup on it!
Our database has nothing on their origins - or, well, anything about them, really.
At first glance, they appear to be a species of virulent, parasitic organisms that thrive by consuming other sentient life of sufficient biomass.
Well, that's new. And scary. These organisms are... interesting.
Signal flares. We must be close.
Uhh, Sergeant. What's happening to them? What are they doing? They're attacking us!

Base, this is Forge. We're under heavy fire...
Base, reinforcements are here. Clear the area so I can move Anders safely.

Forge here. Cover us - I'm getting Anders out of here.

I won't move Anders until the area is cleared of enemy units!

Forge here...we made it! Ready for extraction!

Covenant units are breaking though entrances we thought were sealed. Keep an eye on those doors in there.

The Covenant are right on our ass! Keep moving!
That Covenant artillery is getting awfully close...
Get to that crater. Do not engage the enemy behind us! Keep moving!
We only have a little time to prep the base for the Covenant attacks. Let's get to it!
Clear the enemy out of this crater!
The Command Center is under attack! Defend it!
Let's see what these Spartans can do. Push the Covenant back!
Covenant Mega Turret! We've got to take it out somehow!

Spartan Team Omega is prepped and ready. Pelican is en route.
We're dropping a Command Center in that crater for you.
I've contacted other UNSC forces in the area and informed them to retreat to your position.
Help is coming. Trust me, you won't be disappointed.
They're not very happy with us after helping those civilians escape.
Watch for enemy ambushes along the highway. Radio chatter indicates they know you're coming.
We cannot lose our foothold on Arcadia, gentlemen! Secure a defendable position and hold it until we can reinforce you.
Hold that crater at all costs!
Help is on the way, do not lose that Command Center.
Ha! You are rushing too. This will be brutal.
Nice turrets, but what happens if I walk around them.
I guess you listened to my warning... I may have to suprise you next time.
I told you I would rush. You should have built some dudes sooner.
You built some defenses. Let's find out if they were enough.
Scans seem clear. Shall we see what's inside?
Looks like we only shook the beehive. We've got multiple bogies incoming!
Serina is detecting a lot of activity in the Dome. Get some Turrets up on this base ASAP.
Press $$A$$ on an open building site then press $$A$$ while over the Reactor.
Data from the shelling proves we're on the right track, but we need to simultaneously launch from multiple Rhinos.
Use $$Y$$ to lock down a Rhino
The Rhino has arrived! Get it to the position 1.
Remember, you can request more Rhinos from the landing pad.
I'll take control of that Rhino to calibrate the shots.

I've marked the second position. Request another Rhino and get it to that site.
We should take out those Covenant buildings that are reinforcing their position.
